sn1.3:1.2: Standing to one side, that devatā recited this verse in the presence of the Blessed One:
sn1.3:2.1: “Life is swept along,  short is the life span;
sn1.3:2.2: No shelters exist for one who has reached old age.
sn1.3:2.3: Seeing clearly this danger in death,
sn1.3:2.4: One should do deeds of merit that bring happiness. ”
sn1.3:3.1: “Life is swept along, short is the life span;
sn1.3:3.2: No shelters exist for one who has reached old age.
sn1.3:3.3: Seeing clearly this danger in death,
sn1.3:3.4: A seeker of peace should drop the world’s bait. ”
